entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:17 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Manan 01:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -18.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -20.5°C
Wind: NW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 18 except minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
